LanguageData.ATR_CreateT1Android.label: Create T1 Android
LanguageData.ATR_CreateT1Android.description: Create a blank T1 Android from Plasteel and components.
LanguageData.ATR_CreateT2Android.label: Create T2 Android
LanguageData.ATR_CreateT2Android.description: Create a blank T2 Android from Plasteel, Gold and components.
LanguageData.ATR_CreateT3Android.label: Create T3 Android
LanguageData.ATR_CreateT3Android.description: Create a blank T3 Android from Plasteel, Gold and advanced components.
LanguageData.ATR_CreateT4Android.label: Create T4 Android
LanguageData.ATR_CreateT4Android.description: Create a blank T4 Android from Plasteel, Gold and advanced components.
LanguageData.ATR_CreateWatchdog.label: Create drone watchdog
LanguageData.ATR_CreateWatchdog.description: Create a drone watchdog unit, a mechanical wolf analogue that combines lethality, intelligence, and amicability into a companionable frame.
LanguageData.ATR_CreateTORT.label: Create TORT unit
LanguageData.ATR_CreateTORT.description: Create a TORT unit for all retrieval and transportation needs.
LanguageData.ATR_CreateMineralUnit.label: Create drone mineral unit
LanguageData.ATR_CreateMineralUnit.description: Create a drone mineral unit, a simple utility machine that ravenously consumes organic matter to synthesize steel.
LanguageData.ATR_CreateNutritionUnit.label: Create nutrition unit
LanguageData.ATR_CreateNutritionUnit.description: Create a simple mechanical unit that consumes organic matter to synthesize a long-lasting milk-like foodstuff that is extremely high in nutritive value.
LanguageData.ATR_CreateChemUnit.label: Create chemical processing unit
LanguageData.ATR_CreateChemUnit.description: Create a simple mechanical unit that consumes organic matter to produce a synthetic chemical precursor that can be processed into chemfuel or neutroamine.
